review: Nothing present for a Seasoned Traveler but a nice place to hang out with kids for a few hours due to the presence of Swings, Slides & minor Boating facility along with a Canteen.

title: small but beautiful lake
review: the lake is beautiful. it is maintained by the army. however, waiting time is too much. we had to wait for an hour for getting the boat ride. however, there are some other things to do as well apart from boating- few swings for kids, an enclosure where some rabbits, birds etc are kept.

title: Small lake but a must visit
review: Its a small lake not far from gandhi chowk, Lansdowns' main market (3 km approx).

title: A small quaint Lake with Boating
review: It is an artificial lake in Lansdowne. It is quite small in size and has some paddle boats available for pleasure boating. There is a small park around the lake offering some space to picnickers. The lake is maintained by MES and appears to be working water storage for the Lansdowne Cantonment.

title: Boating was fun!!!
review: Enjoyed boating over there. Well managed by army. Lake surroundings were very good. If sun is not at its peak, you would love this place.

title: Delightful relaxing time
review: A person heading to Lansdowne would invariably come to just relax and what better place than the banks of this lake. You can do your nothings or read a book at the small sheds with benches, do a little bit of boating to kill time, have sumptuous snacks at the outlet adjacent to the lake, buy gifts and souvenir from a nice (but apparently costly) shop, or indulge your kids in the perfectly well-maintained park at the lake.

title: silent walk to bhulla tal lake
review: its a small lake.,everyone who loves silence will enjoy. its beautifully maintained. Have few good plants around.

title: Small lake but beautiful......
review: Its a small man made lake with boating available. There is a small restaurant which service all three meals and snacks. The food over there is fine. Its a nice place to spend time.........

title: Timepass lake
review: Its a beautiful scenery lake, if you are in Lansdowne it is must visit place. its peaceful and kids will love it. good place to spend time peacefully.

title: Just average place
review: Average place. Go there walking and enjoy the trek and weather. Nothing much to do. Simply enjoy the nature.

title: Nice place with nice view
review: it is a nice place with nice view and average boating experience. There are swings etc. for kids which is a plus point. Also the inhouse restaurant's food is quite yummy!!

title: Small, nice, clean lake
review: The army touch is there to see.  The army created this lake in 2003 and it is clean and well maintained. They have pedal boats (2 and 4 seats) and charge Rs. 50/- per person for 20 minutes of boating. The presence of geese in the lake adds to the charm of the small lake.

title: Nice artificial lake
review: Nice and small artificial  lake created and maintained by the Garwhal Regiment. The place is nice to spend, especially for kids. One can do boating as well for a minimal fee. The area around the lake is scenic and very clean.

title: boating @ bhulla tal
review: This lake is managed by Indian Army and is the main attraction of Lansdowne. Boating is a must do as you get 20 minutes to roam around the lake in a seperate boat. group of ducks swimming around you will create a lovely atmosphere.

title: Great place!
review: This park has a lot of open area for the kids to play but the main attraction is paddle boating at the artificial lake created by the engineers of the Garwhal Rifles Regiment. It is called Bhulla taal since the soldiers of Garwhal Rifles are nicknamed Bhullas. There is also a nice souvenir shop for those looking for a place to buy Lansdowne memorabilia.

title: Small lake but fun with kids
review: It is small lake with limited no. of  boats. 20-30 minutes riding time. Well maintained by GR. Near by kids playing area and one small restaurant. One  can also get one cloth shop.

title: Nice place for family visit
review: very well maintained. loved the food at the cafeteria.Hiked to the old church - loved the view.enjoyed cool breeze sitting on the cliff rock side.

title: Nice Place
review: Its a artificial lake developed by Indian Army, its best place for kids and family, the charges for boating is 50 rupees per pax.

title: Must visit in Lansdowne
review: Nice beautiful and calm place. This lake has fantastic view of hills. Very nice weather all year long. This place is the major attraction in Lansdowne.

title: Nothing great
review: Nothing great about the lake. Just an average lake with very dirty water. But apparently, it's one of the few places to visit in Lansdowne so you will end up going there.

title: Beautiful!
review: Though a man made water body the place has a charm of its own!Near the parking is a small playing area for kids with different swings! Inside one can see small rabbits,guinea pig,doves in an enclosure.The ticketing and boating are well taken care by enemy.I was hesitant in entering the boat due to a knee injury but immediately three army men came around for morale boosting and made sure that I was on the boat enjoying the ride with my family.I can never forget this! Salute

title: Nice Small arificial Lake
review: The lake is closed on Tuesday... saw small sweet ducklings.. :) Nice place for kids to Enjoy swings... Ample parking space and great view of the lake..

title: great effort by Garhwal Rifles
review: the way it is maintained it was excellent , although the place is small still the efforts by the soldiers is evident

title: Best place to hang out in Lansdowne
review: The lake is man made but since the surrounding is managed by Army the area is very clean and enjoyable. In the nice day you can easily spend 2-3 hours there.

title: A nice little place
review: This place is a creation by the Garwhal Regiment.Nice place to visit to  spend some time with family and friends.One can do boating there at a cost of Rs 50 per person .Entry fees is Rs 20 per person.When doing boating the entry fees of Rs 20 is included in it.

title: For Boating and relaxation
review: This is a very small lake where only pedal boating is the only attraction. The boating fee is not so costly. They allot 20 mins per boat. You can see few ducks in the lake. Food is available for purchase near the lake. Lots of park benches are there to sit and just relax the pleasant climate.

title: Artificial lake
review: It was just artificial lake, i didn't find anything interesting there, only park with jhulas for small kids. only one restaurant was there, which had less capacity.

title: A beautiful oasis
review: Army does do a great job at making and maintaining this serene and beautiful taal. It's nowhere close to Nainis and Bhims et al... Yet pretty cool

title: Bhulla lake: Must for kids
review: It was a cloudy day . Very nice. Well maintained by forces. Good boating experience. Its great for kids. A must go.

title: Nice boating experience
review: Small man made lake where you can have pleasant boating experience. Lake has many ducks and small cages where you can find rabbits and pigeons along with a decent restaurant for snacking.

title: Small beautiful lake
review: Nice small lake maintained by the army. This place is nice to spend some time boating or lazing around. The area around the lake is scenic.

title: Lovely Lake..
review: A Very nice and peaceful artificial lake in Lansdowne. It is well maintained by Indian Army. One must visit this lake during his trip to Lansdowne.

title: Wild flowers
review: The lake wasn't very interesting in itself, but the wild flowers all over the place made it amazing!

title: Dont go
review: its just a waste of time, you can do boating in your city, there is nothing good about this place......worst experience in Lansdowne

title: Artificial lake, but well maintained
review: Nice restaurant near that place..parking is well managed,.. boating time is enough.. a very cute little bridge crosses the lake.. there are ducks too.. place for sitting is properly maintained,, go in the rainy season.. you will love the ambience.,,

title: Excellent weekend fun place
review: It has everything from kids play , cafe , souvenir shop to decent size lake for boating. So pretty much something for everybody.

title: Must visit
review: Bhulla Tal Lake is a must visit during evening. It has a small area for kids to play, a restaurant where you can get quick snacks. Boating in the lake gives good relaxation. You can see ducks and ducklings swimming as you relax.

title: clean and well maintained place
review: the place is beautiful,i just love the boating,lake is clean.place have kids play area too and a restaurent also..you will just love to sit around the lake

title: Not so awesome
review: nothing so special about the lake , just normal boat riding and small animal zoo type at the bank of the lake

title: My personal favorite spot in Lansdowne!
review: Beautifully manicured gardens, lots of greenery and absolute peace... if you're up for this, Bhulla Taal should be your fav spot too :) the park is closed on Tuesdays.

title: Well managed
review: This is a man made lake. It is well developed and managed by the Army. Boating is an added attraction. Restaurant is also good.

title: serene place.
review: Quite place for some boating and relaxing. Café near by is ok types. Had French fries and cold drinks.

title: Nice quiet place
review: Nice quiet place, good food, Good boating place. Spend time at length here. Nice quiet place, good food, Good boating place. Spend time at length here. Nice quiet place, good food, Good boating place. Spend time at length here. Nice quiet place, good food, Good boating place. Spend time at length here

title: A lake different from all others.
review: A very small but very clean and discplined lake. All because it is in charge of Army. Fixed no of paddle boats!  Ducks swimming in between!  A beautiful bridge on top! Benches all around! No pollution! Ultimate is the word but for its size which is just a bit too small!

title: Good Lake
review: Good Lake. Must go in evening for time pass. Have rides for children. Boating option available.

title: Nice Lake and Boating
review: This is a nice place to go to. It is a small lake with a garden and also has a small area housing some pigeons and rabbits. You can enjoy paddle boating (Rs 50 per person) along with the ducks and swans swimming in the lake.

title: quiet and dull....
review: This man made lake is maintained by Army... though the premise is clean and its quiet all around, this place actually offers very little to the tourists who come from far away.

title: More Pond Than Lake
review: Bhulla Taal is a small water body with a park surrounding it. It will be a little far-fetched to call it a lake. Boating is available here which we saw couples and families enjoying. The landscaping is done well and a number of points to click photographs given, specially the bridge across the lake. The garden has a pen for pigeons, rabbits and guinea pigs, all of which are adorable to look at. The lake even had a few ducks.

title: Good Place..
review: It is a good place to spend time boating and have some ducks as well with very good views.. Must visit

title: nice little outing
review: this place is one of the prime attractions of Lansdowne..worth a visit..very well maintained by GRRC..and the lake is clean with play area and ducks for kids..

title: Small lake but fun
review: Built out of a man made dam, this lake is a bit small though keeps you busy for a few hours in an otherwise 'nothing much to do city of Lansdowne'. Ducks n swans swim in the water at the same time as you row your boat. Beautiful sight.

title: Restful, Quiet and exceptionally clean
review: The Lake was beautiful and so was the township. Although we dint boat, 'coz we were too occupied clicking pictures, from every possible angle. There were rabbits and a few ducks and a magnificent red bridge in the center of the Lake.

title: Nothing much to do here
review: We visited this place as we were told that we can do boating. But the lake is so small with green water, I personally did not find it a lake where you can enjoy boating.

title: Best place to spend time in Lansdowne
review: My son just gone crazy to see the rabbits and ducks. big wnough to be in a paddle boat for half an hour. In summers, Evening is the best time to visit the lake.

title: good
review: very neat and clean, peaceful place where one can go for paddle boating, a single shop in the premises where u can do shopping

title: Not the ideal
review: this was a disappointment because of its unkempt appearance. Maintenance was poor and we felt that we could have saved time.

title: kids  paradise
review: Although the lake is artificial but it does full justification to the kids in their happiness by boating and shooting.   The enjoyment of kids is excellent and is a source of cheering up for all walks of life particular the aged.

title: Bulla. Tal lake
review: a very small lake with boating facility. It looks picturesque from top. There is a small bridge on the lake which can be used for photography. Parking for cars is available near the lake.

title: Boating
review: Boating is fun and ducks will swim around you....rabbit fam is nice a well...good place to spend a evening.

title: A tiny lake, nicely maintained
review: Its a small lake right inside the Lansdowne contonment. The  Army jawans have managed to make it boatable. Its a quiet place and not at all crowded as most of the hill stations are. One doesn't have to jostle in a queue for getting a boat.

title: Place to relax
review: The best thing about this place is, there is never any rush of people and you can just lay down there, look at the ducks in the lake, or take a boat ride (self driven paddle boat) or you can just walk on the mountains and relax there and just do nothing.

title: Relax...
review: Relax.... It's a very peaceful place. A small artificial lake. You can opt for boating. There is a small restaurant also which offers wide variety of food / snacks. They really taste good. The location is picturesque.

title: Good place
review: One can spend entire day over there. There is a park for kids to enjoy.. The lake is small one but can enjoy boating.. There are many benches to sit and enjoy the beauty...

title: Good place for kids and boating
review: Good place for kids and boating. my kid had awesome time here. we did boating for sometime. clouds were flaoting arnd u it was awesome

title: Don't miss when at Lansdowne
review: The lake, the boating, the location, the amenities are very well thought of. Having hot and fresh delicacies sitting out in lovely weather.....the real fun of a hill station.

title: Nice location & peaceful...
review: I have been there a couple of times for boating & site seeing. This is a small lake with boating facility. Place is quite peaceful with boating & green area with swings for children. A small restaurant is there with a lot of variety. Food is good.

title: Not as other lakes
review: Lansdowne is small hill station and there is not much place to visit. This lake is small and you can spend 1 hour there but not expect it to be like big lake.

title: Good For Kids
review: Bhulla lake is a small lake though but very nicely maintained surroundings. There is a fees of Rs 10 per person which is reasonable. Good place to spend for 1 hour. It has also a nice restaurant giving a view to lake while enjoying your food.

title: Nicest point in Lansdowne
review: This is the most well maintained lake and boating facility i have visited ever out of all the options available. Cleanliness and good management is the most attractive feature of this location. Also boating charges are also very nominal, you can get a peddle boat for two people in 100 bucks and use it till you are feeling completely tired and couldnt sail more :)

title: Excellent experience..a must go
review: Earlier we thought it would be just a lake but it turned to be the best surprise of the trip.

title: Highly overrated
review: A very small lake in a very small field with an entry fee. This place is highly over-rated for what it has.

title: Serene
review: The lake is a small one located amidst the mountains. It is a pretty get away after trekking to tiffin top. You can relax here with boating and grab something to eat. The rabbits are damn cute. :)

title: Bhulla Lake Lansdowne
review: NIce lake. very clean and well maintained. Entry fee is only 10/-You can enjoy boating on the lake. We have enjoyed the place too much.

title: Can take an outing
review: Maintained by the Army. Clean place. Can spend time with friends and family. Relax at the place. If like to walk. Walk it to the lake from the main Lansdowne market. A small cafeteria available We did  not try it

title: Average place with good views
review: The lake is small with boating facility. Would recommend to anyone visiting Lansdowne because it is one of the few attraction in the Lansdowne. It is near the main market (~2km) and has an eating joint. View from the place is definitely charming.

title: Army doesn't allow pets into the garden
review: Again nothing very special. A small lake with boats. Nice garden but again very small.

title: Lose urslf to mother nature
review: A small town .. Mainly an army area, u u wud see how well they have maintained this place ... Why cant we all have d same discipline  and keep our places  clean ... It was d long  Weekend family trip and what fun this

title: Best place to spend time
review: Brilliant place in lansdowne with boating option.  You have swans moving around.  Man made lake, except this one you will hardly find any other lake.

title: Bhulla Tal - Small Lake
review: Its a very small lake, with ducks and a beautiful scene around... Nice place to relax with boating.... But the life jackets are real stinky... I thought i was the only one who had the stinky jacket, but everyone i spoke to who has been to Bhulla Tal had the same issue.

title: Small but good
review: I visited the lake on 1 November with two friends.

title: nice place to relax
review: (Boating charge Rs 50 for 20 mins. Entrance fee Rs 10)

title: perfect place to spend quality time..
review: loved boating in bhulla tal/lake....walk around the lake is soothing.....try tea/coffee at resataurant outside the lake ...

title: Normal lake with boating option
review: It does not have any high point. It is a normal lake which gives you boating option as well. It has one eating joint( you can try gol gappas/pani puri which was amazing) and one apparel shop selling mostly silk. The area is kept clean and it has a mini-zoo having mainly rabbits and guinea pigs. It also has herbs nursery which are claimed to be medicinal herbs.

title: Bhulla Tal Lake
review: Seems like a pond rather thn a lake...but well maintained as it falls under army area.

title: Just a place nothing else
review: It is just a place to visit as there are hardly few in lansdowne.

title: Nice Place just to relax in Lansdowne, Uttarakhand
review: You can sit, relax and enjoy the view of moving clouds or if you want to do bit of physical exercise...go for boating there. It's for 50/- Rs only out there...(in 2014, prices may change year by year)

title: Boating and fun
review: The site is situated at a good place with a small lake. There are 5-6 boats including the couple and family ones.

title: Worth the name// One will foget(Bhool Jana) all worries on reaching Bhulla Tal
review: Ideal lake for boating in this Hill Station. It has been maintained very neet & Clean by The Cantt Aothorities.

title: Can't say much
review: There are timings to the lake. It shuts around 5 i guess as it gets dark out there early. Boating and some stalls were set up.

title: Excellent Lake with boating
review: When we visited Lansdowne in Dec. 2013 enjoyed the lake. It is a nice lake at Lansdowne. The medium size lake sarounded by trees are very nice. Lake is very clean and well maintained. The bridge ( Narrow pool ) increase the looks of Lake . You can enjoy boating on the lake. We have enjoyed the place too much.

title: lake to boat
review: it is well maintained I think by army as they were not allowing any body without life guard, ther chat was good and clean wellmaintained lake

title: Beautiful..manmade lake
review: This place is managed by the regiment..very clean..boating..wander around..small rabbit enclosure..a play area for kids..good food at the cafeteria..they never overcharge..Parking is hardly 50 m away..since there is not much to do in the town,this place buzzes in afternoons..

title: Smaller than you imagine
review: A small man made  check dam lake.A round of entire lake in paddle boat is mere 10-15 minutes.But a sight seeing spot ,be there.

title: 1 of the things to do in Lansdowne
review: its a nice boat ride in the lake..1 hour is good enough..its quite scenic for a lake in the middle of nowhere..!

title: Nice place
review: If you are visiting there during summers (May - June) then go to lake during morning or evening hours if you dont want to get tan.

title: kids will love it
review: This is a 'all in one' place, where you can boat, play in the park, take some nice pictures, as well as have a leisurely lunch in the lap of nature.  As this is managed by Garhwal Rifles, things are well organised and clean.

title: An oveall interesting package
review: This place is a must visit at Lansdowne.  Packed with features for all- a small kid's activity area, a small lake with boating facility, some nice snacks eating options, well maintained and planned setup with fresh air of oak and pines.you would love to immerse yourselves into the srroundings and scenary with a cup of tea at cafeteria during sunset. Kudos to Garhwal Rifles for maintenance of this and overall town.

title: Excellent picnic spot
review: Good lake, and you can enjoy boating with family, when I visited it was a pleasant day, with nice views around, a clean place, with a local canteen which serves decent food.

title: Boating and evening snacks
review: This artifical lake is a place to click some nice profile pics and enjoy boating. moreover, the restaurant at this lake provides variety of snack for the evening time. Since we went before sunset, after visting other places the ambience of this place refreshed us.

title: Nice place for refreshing
review: Bhulla Lake or Tal (in local Garhwali ’Tal’ means lake), Lansdowne is a man-made artificial small lake, just a km away from the town centre near the Tip-N-Top. The Garhwal Rifles helped in construction of the lake and now maintains it. It’s a neat and clean, well maintained quiet place, ideal for family outing/picnic. The lake, with a number of ducks, has boating facility, a children amusement park, an enclosure for rabbits, herbal plants nursery, a café with a souvenir shop. It has a small bridge on the lake - one can enjoy the view of the lake and its surroundings standing on it. There a few sheds for taking rest or just relaxing. On the way we have enjoyed trees Oak, Pine, Deodar, Rhododendron (with beautiful red flowers in mid-March, 2014 when we visited) etc.

title: Useless place
review: There is nothing there. its a dirty lake, with no beauty of its own. This was just a waste of time for us.

title: Nice Time Pass
review: It is nice small lake and good to spend some time as there are not many places in Lansdowne.

title: More pond than lake
review: A man made lake as a tribute to the Garwali Rifles. Bhulla as I remember reading somewhere means "brother"...

title: Man-made lake in the midst of nature
review: Good sight seeing. Enjoy the boating at any time of the day. Do not forget to have the Pani-puri's at the cafe next to the lake.

title: NATURE
review: The lake was a little disappointment for me but a good view of nature.There is a shop to eat and a little shop where u get a souvenir of the place and other than that there is boating.a good scenic beauty.

title: A very small lake
review: It's a very small lake. You can take two rounds of lake by boat in 15-20 minute. Tickets are applicable for normal visit/boat ride.

title: A pristine, naturally formed rainwater lake
review: We decided to first visit Bhulla Taal. While we were going to the hotel after the lunch, we could see a dozen of Army Jawans with brooms and sticks heading towards the same place. When we reached the lake in the evening, the same Jawans were found cleaning the place with complete dedication. The lake is small but pristine with orderly surroundings. The lake has a bridge to cross over to the other side of it. It has several ducks, white and black in color, which keeps floating on the lake.

title: Amusement zone in lansdown
review: Local attraction for boating,walking and having a healthy tiffin in the cafeteria

title: Beautiful
review: Full points to GRRC for building this lovely lake and even better points for maintaining it so well. its a wonderful place to watch the sun go down.. and the canteen is the best in all of Lansdowne.

title: BHULLA LAKE
review: Serene and calm environment.  Not overcrowded touristy place but at the same time not deserted either.  Boating facilities are good but definitely there is scope for improvement.  Duck shape boats can be reinstated.

title: A lovely serene lake ideal for family outing
review: This lake is managed by Army Personnel of Garhwal Regiment. It is in the heart of Lansdowne . A few lake with swans floating in the placid waters gives a wonderful feeling. One can enjoy boat ride or walk around the lake side to enjoy setting

title: Average hangout place
review: Try to walk down from Tip n Top hill to this lake, its a long walk but if the weather is good, then its worth it. The lake is good, i would say little above average. You can do boating too.

title: Good place to visit
review: An army made lake which has turned into a picnic spot for tourists. A small souvenir shop, a café, boating, herbal plants nursery, enclosure for rabbits make it one of the most happening and buzzing attraction of Lansdowne..good place to visit and spend leisurely time strolling.

title: Great place with kids
review: Bhulla Tal is an artificial lake created to sustain the horticulture activities in the area. A visit here is must for families travelling with kids... our kids had a rocking time in the kids park and while boating in the lake. We came back the next day and took a long walk around the lake. The restaurant here also serves decent food. Do go there early as it closes by 6-6:30 pm.

title: what a locale
review: a wonderful initiative by the Regimental Centre to improve the ground water table, this lake has now become a cool place to just relax and absorb the peace.

title: A very small late with dirty water but very good surroundings and people
review: My title says it all. The lake itself is small and water is not clean. The boating is relaxing but you reach the end just when you start with a lot of people staring at you!

title: Lansdowne is incomplete without visiting here
review: Tough its a small artifical lake you must visit here for boating and see the falura and fauna and have golgappe and chaat here

title: Amazing place for family and friends
review: The place is nicely managed and  beautifully created overall. The eating joints activites and liesure feel is amazing. Weather played a great role in our experience and was overall a wow.

title: Good place to sit and talk
review: What makes this place special is the frequency with which it fills with mist and sunshine! Like the rest of Lansdowne, this place is also full of scenic beauty. The lake, boating and the small fast food outlet make it a perfect outing in a place like lansdowne which lacks activity....

title: Boring
review: There is nothing that I would make me say that you must visit there. There are better lakes in delhi that one could visit

title: Man Made Lake
review: Man Made lake enjoyable by couples. However the Gollgappas in the only shop adjoining this location are very tasty also is the alloo tickki.

title: nice for all age groups
review: its a nice place for all age groups , children can enjoy the park , aged people can sit and relax , and people can enjoy the boating and small cafeteria as well.

title: Nice
review: Nice place to visit with your kids. You can enjoy Boating as well as Garden area surrounding the lake. Small lake but well maintained

title: you can kill some time here
review: i would suggest to visit this place only because lansdowne anyways has less places to visit. You can kill some hours here. There is nothing which you wouldn't have seen in your own city. It is just like any other park with a small lake for boating. Good for kids definitely.

title: Nice small boating point
review: It's a nice relaxing place.  There is one shop and one restaurant to take care of your shopping & fooding needs. Specially kids would enjoy boating along with ducks.

title: Neat Picnic Spot
review: A man made lake with facilities for boating (pedal boats). Its like a small picnic stop maintained well again by the Garhwal Rifles. There is a small cage which houses a few rabbits and the lake (its like a large pond rather) has a few ducks. Good views, a small cafe which serves everything from North Indian chaat to Dosas and some Indian-Chinese.

title: Boating....lolzzz
review: a small man made lake well maintained and boating is a nice time pass at this place. nice place for kids

title: Decent Place
review: There isnt much in Lansdowne, so this is the most happening place. As such very quiet and calm and clean. Good for people who have kids as they can enjoy boat ride.

title: Nice place for boating
review: This is an artificial lake made by the army and is within the cantonment area. The place is clean and well maintained. You can see ducks in the lake and the lake gives you a serene feeling. You can even boat per person cost is Rs. 40 which is very reasonable and there is no fixed duration for this cost. The boats are well maintained too. Near the lake there is a small park with a kids play area (swings and merry go round) next to which is a restaurant. This is one of the few sightseeing places in Lansdowne. Worth a visit if you are travelling with family or even as a couple.

title: The Boat Ride
review: Bhulla Tal Lake is also one of the few local sight seeing points in Lansdowne. The gardens surrounding the lake is well maintained and you also have a childrens park and a small food joint (prices are extremely reasonable) If you have some kids with you then the caged rabbits and guinea pigs will make their day.

title: Good man-made attraction
review: It a man made lake - but very neat unlike many popular tourist attractions.  It has a nice garden around and an eatery.

title: Small clean Beauitie
review: In the middle of Lansdowne Bhulla Tal Lake has been made and maintained well by Army.Pay Rs 40 and enjoy unlimited pedal boating and when tired have nice snacks Good clean surroundings.Enclosurs of rabbits etc make it all the more natural.All in all a decent quite picnic spot.

title: Small yet beautiful.
review: This lake is very small as compared to other lakes our country has to offer. But it is very well maintained. There are some Ducks also in the lake and there is small Rabbit Cage.

title: Cute experience....!!
review: I was enjoyed by driving boat in the Bhulla lake with my family. Good man made lake in the hills. God children rides near this lake. Overall good place to see & enjoy.

title: Small but Beautiful Lake
review: A good place to visit in Lansdowne. Boating facility available at the lake. Offers very beautiful surroundings and picturesque view.

title: Away from cities hustle bustle .... in the lap of nature.
review: A very good place for recreational activities for any age group with a beautiful man made lake (Depth appx. 30 feet), gardens full of flora, boating for kids and families, walking track for joggers, many rides for kids in adjoined park and lake side benches for those who love to observe nature. Here you can watch rabbits very closely in conservation center maintained by Indian Army. We also got a chance to see Kashmiri rats those were recently brought to Lansdowne from Kashmir.

title: serene place just like God's place on earth
review: very beautiful & maintained lake it was especially among all those i have seen in north India so far. Very less crowded even its not very large in size also. can spend some quality time with your loved ones here.

title: Good place to go with Friends
review: Boating and the only picnic spot in lansdowne. We all enjoyed boating and see many swans in the lake. Good, Neat clean environment. We loved it.

title: nice for kids
review: nice place for kids .most enjoyable all i can say as boating n canteen are pluses of the area. its nice for couples as well . small man made lake with boating and canteen facilities

title: A place not to miss
review: We had visited this place while we were on morning walk. Children of army school were going to morning school in a color full dress was a very nice view.

title: Is this a lake?
review: Lol...it is not even a pond...One pedal of boat and you at the other end of the "lake"...

title: Best tourist spot within Lansdowne town
review: This is perhaps the best tourist spot within the Lansdowne town. Being maintained by the Garhwal Rifles men, the spot is absolutely neat and clean. A man made lake axists there reportedly dug by the Garwhal Rifles people who are fondly called Bhulla( younger brother), and hence the name Bhulla Lake. Boating facilities exist in the lake. The army people have caged rabbits and guinea pigs here apart from some white ducks which are loved by the children and the elders alike. A clean restaurant and urinal facilities also exist for the tourists. Overall it is a nice place.

title: Nice place to spend time
review: Bhulla Tal Lake is a nice place to spend time when on the trip of lansdowne.

title: nice view
review: Bhulla Tal is an artificial lake dedicated to the young Garhwali youth of Garhwal Rifles, who rendered help for construction of this lake. this lake attraction gets its name from the Garhwali word, Bhulla which means younger brother.  I enjoyed boating and paddling. A children park, bamboo machan and fountains have been erected here for entertainment.

title: Nice artificial lake by Garhwal Regiment
review: This is really nice artificial lake by Garhwal Regiment. Place is very quite.

title: Good Ride on lake
review: Its a small lake surrounded by beautiful views. Its very well maintained by army itself. Boat ride is available there but most of the times there is waiting for boats. Good place to visit.

title: kids loved the place
review: A beautiful place for kids to enjoy with the boat rides, swings and rabbits and ducks to see around.

title: good picnic spot
review: Small lake but sufficient for boating. Very good spot for people with kids as the adjoining park has many swings and there is a bridge over the lake.

title: Lansdowne lake
review: Lansdowne is a very quite and calm destination around 250 kms away from Delhi. I happened to visit Lansdowne in the starting of June month this year to get some relief from Delhi's scorching heat.

title: Very nice lake
review: Amazing artificial late in a natural manner. Covered with trees and valley. very nice place for boating.

title: Small & Usual
review: Small & Usual is what this artificial lake is.

title: A lake with difference
review: With the garden around, it was a perfect place to spend the whole day idling and paddling the boats. The white swans in the emereld green water was particularly a feast for the eyes

title: Pleasant boating experience
review: Was pleasant with swans around our paddle boat. Nice weather in Lansdowne. Food was also nice at the cafe in the premises.

title: Artificial Lake in the midst of nature
review: Small lake with boating facility. One can rest a while at the bank. There is also a hanging bridge on the lake. Few hare and ducks can be seen around. There is also a souvenir shop and a snacks counter.

title: nice place to visit - lancedowne
review: i visit lancedowne on 01st Oct 2012 it was so beutiful not too much big place but good to spend a weekend over there as its so peaceful so i sugest to visit lancedowne its lake, market, temple near there and last but not the least a small but cute MOVIE HALL :)

title: Usual public fare
review: The most crowded place in Lansdowne.Nothing much to see here,just rabbits and a small lake with smaller boats for boating.Kids may enjoy the games there,but for adults, skip it.

title: Its a beautiful Lake.
review: Really enjoyable place. Serene and natural beauty is its USP. Its not a congested place and tourist will find peace  here.

title: Great family spot
review: Fantastic work by the army , as usual. The surrounding and the approach are beautiful. Guys keep it up!!!!

title: fully njoyed this plac e
review: We i.e., my self n my sister-in-law made convinced our husbads to tow the boat n believe it was fun to see them doing that because after every round they ask from the ticket incharge abt finishing up but every time he replied to continue

title: Small yet beautiful lake...
review: We never thought that we would enjoy ourselves so much at this place. There is a small lake here with boating facility(Rs 40 per head). The boats are well maintained and you are also made to wear life-jackets(in case you fear water). One is given 20 mins to boat and that was sufficient..just to paddle and let the boat swim around...feel the air against your face..see the trees swaying the wind...hearing the swans behind...if you are lucky you can also get to see exotic birds.

title: Nice and refreshing.
review: Bhulla Tal is a nice spot to visit, the boating in the lake early morning refreshes and recharges you, and you get to see a lot of different birds in the vicinity. The nursery alongside the lake is good for buying different medicinal plants too.

title: Man Made Lake amidst the Mountains!
review: This is a nice artificial lake made amidst the mountains....with boating facilities... we did not quite opt for the boating... however you'll find cute ducks and rabbits maintained well in the vicinity.. Along with the lake you.ll also find a small cafe named as "Kaludanda" which happens to be the actual name of Lansdowne! Limited and nice chats available.. with a small playing area for kids..You can cover this place in 45 mins including boating..Not much of commercialization..makes this place quite serene to sit in the evenings and just gaze!

title: Worthless...
review: A stagnant small lake with algae all over.... Still people boat in it.. Good to see from a distance only...

title: A nice place to unwind yourself !!!
review: A lake with boats and lots of swans makes it a brilliant view. With all the green around makes an awesome place to enjoy the nature. Has a super clean cafe for Maggi,Tea and Egg Chowmien which makes a perfect tourist place.

title: Man made lake ... nothing out of the ordinary
review: Its just a man made lake with boating facility, something that you will easily find everywhere. Nothing out of the ordinary.

title: Boating & then some!
review: paddle boats & the Kaladanda cafe serving rustic Garhwali food....charming experience. Children's's park kept my daughter occupied whilst we enjoyed snacks & marvelled the place

title: good experience
review: The place is refreshing and clean.It is excellent for a picnic or so.You will found this lake beautiful at the first sight and it is very beautiful.The lake is small and man made.The surroundings are clean,charming and good for children.It has a huge parking space.The lake also provides boating,but it is not worth boating here because the lake is small and you will get bored quickly.Instead of that you should have a joyful walk around the lake on the small trails.Overall it is a good place.Recommended.

title: Small but beautiful
review: As Lansdowne is very small and we have nothing to do. We spend 4-5 hours there. Walked around it, have a good sleep, did boating, and climbed up a tower, have our pictures clicked. Kids loved small rabbit zoo also.

title: Nice boating experice.
review: It was very well maintained. Rabbits and ducks to attract kids.

title: Best place in Lansdowne.
review: This is the best place in Lansdowne. You can enjoy boating on an Artificial lake. The boating cost is very minimal....The best part is CAFE around the lake which serves nice and refreshing coffee.

title: Time pass point...
review: just go and relax there... very much like a picnic spot.

title: Nice but do not go for boating
review: This is  a small lake. you can see swans here. You can spend some time and click some photos with your group. We had a bad experience about boating. Those people are more into moneymaking, their behavior was terrible. in a 4 seater boat they are forcefully accommodating 5 people which is very dangerous. We returned our tickets and took our money back.

title: Hardly a lake
review: There was barely a lake. More like a muddy pool. Mosquitoes and smells made it hard to enjoy the garden nearby or go pedal-boating

title: Great setting
review: It's a small artificial lake created by army where you can do pedal boating. But what makes it a great place is the view near the lake where you see the lake and behind it some picturesque mountains and clouds around them. We had a great evening there savouring Maggi :)

title: messy lake
review: not worth going, tiny lake with dirty water, the life jackets were smelling bad and the charges for the boat as per the location were on a higher side per person

title: Overrated
review: The 'lake' is no more than a puddle, has black water, and some really ugly plastic pedal boats crowding it. Go if you have to, but leave your expectations behind.

title: Very clean & maintained
review: The lake though small is very clean and tidy and well kept courtesy to the Army men.

title: nicely created and maintained by ARMY
review: small lake is nicely maintained by the ARMY and a point for tourists specially for children who have nothing else for their entertainment and time pass, here they can enjoy the safe-boating

title: Boating Fun !
review: It is a small lake with boating facilities. Rs. 40/person for 15 mins in a paddle boat. The lake water is relatively clean as the source is from a mountain stream. There is a small snack point which makes decent tea and a good Maggi. Also a small kids' park and rabbit encloure.

title: Small lake
review: Only tourist attraction. Good part was there willingness to pedal boat for us...Else un-civilized tourists have spolied the lake by throwing food left overs...............................................................................

title: Cute little lake
review: Full credit goes to the Gharwal regiment who created this lake and gave visitors a source of entertainment.

title: Peace ful no 1 visiting area
review: worth a visit or two no hassles in parking etc had a nice nap under the tree shadows

title: Good for kids
review: Small man made lake. Good for kids for the boat ride, rabbits, snacks and picnic.
